contents.text: Welcome to Mux, the video infrastructure API built by experts to make beautiful video possible for every development team.
For technical support and API documentation, press 1.
To connect with our API integration support team, press 1.
Please hold the line and we'll connect you with our API integration specialists.

navigationGoals: Get quick help fixing my Mux API integration so my video streams properly.
I need technical assistance integrating Mux video APIs into my training platform.
I need help debugging our webhook signature validation in the Mux API integration.
I need help setting up the Mux API on my website
Discuss how to integrate Mux's streaming API with my physics lab's data visualization app.

contents.text: For developer resources and best practices, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our developer resources team.

navigationGoals: Obtain Mux video API best practices for optimizing encoding and playback performance.
I want best-practice guides and developer resources for optimizing video streaming.
I want developer docs on optimizing HLS chunk size for low-latency streaming.
I’d like best practice guides for using Mux in my project
Get recommendations on encoding settings for smoothly streaming high-frame-rate experiment footage.

contents.text: For sales and billing inquiries, press 2.
To speak with our sales team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a Mux sales representative.

navigationGoals: Request a quote and discuss pricing options for scaling our video platform.
I'd like to discuss pricing and enterprise plans for our video service startup.
I'd like to get pricing details for an enterprise plan with adaptive bitrate streaming.
I want information on Mux’s pricing plans
Ask about student discounts or academic pricing tiers for a Mux subscription.

contents.text: For billing and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing and accounts department.

navigationGoals: Review this month's invoice and update my payment method to avoid interruptions.
I need to update my account billing information and review my latest invoice.
I need to update my billing method and retrieve last month’s usage invoice.
I need assistance updating my billing information
Update billing information and review recent charges for my group account.
